source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_000<tab>Today is the day, my friend─Little Ladies' Day is finally upon us! Have you had the chance to enjoy everything it has to offer?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_000今は、女の子のお祭り「プリンセスデー」の真っ只中！
催し物を楽しんでいってくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_001<tab>All the best things require a little extra help! If you're still willing to pitch in, please speak with one of my staff to see what you can do.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_001「三歌姫」の知名度を上げるべく、
ぜひ、宣伝活動へのご協力をお願いいたします！
ご協力いただける際は、この「執事王の侍従」にお声がけを！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_002<tab>The Songbirds have added a great deal to the holiday cheer, haven't they? With everything going so splendidly, it makes me wonder what it was I ever had to be anxious about. You should be proud, my friend.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_BUTLER_000_002ご覧になりましたか！？
あの、豪華な飾り付けと彼女たちの衣装を！
冒険者さんには、何とお礼を申し上げればよいのか……！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_100_010<tab>Come to see me dance? In that case, prepare yourself for an experience you'll never forget!
target: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_100_010<tab>私たちの歌と踊りを、おもいっきり楽しんでいってねっ♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_100_011<tab>I've gone through it again and again. May every note I sing be in perfect harmony!
target: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_100_011<tab>精一杯、心を込めて歌いますので、ぜひお聞きください！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_100_012<tab>Every step I take on this stage has been choreographed to near perfection! If I do say so myself, it'll be something you'll regret missing.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_100_012情熱的な踊りに興味はないですか？
よかったら、観ていってくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_010<tab>Here for an autograph, I take it? Say no more! The twinkle in your eye tells me all that I need to know!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_010お疲れさまっ！
もしかして、ウララのことが気になって見に来たの？
大丈夫、何も言わなくたってウララはお見通しなんだからっ♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_011<tab>Oh, I can't believe no one wants our flyers. It's so frustrating, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If only there was a strategy we could employ to get passersby to take them by the handful.
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_011お疲れさまです。
なかなか「」を貰っていただけませんが……
まずは知ってもらうところから、がんばろうと思います！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_012<tab>How are things faring on the streets, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? You look nearly as exhausted as I feel!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_012お疲れさま。
こっちは、まずまずってところね……
あなたの方は順調にいってるかしら？

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, what do you think of these new outfits? I didn't believe it possible but I continue getting prettier by the day!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_020あれ、)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃない！
この新しい衣装、もう見てくれた？
ますます、ウララのかわいさに研きがかかっちゃうわ～☆

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_021<tab>Do you see them, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─all those people coming to see us? Magnificent, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_021)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
応援してくださる方が増えているのに気付かれましたか！？
この調子で、引き続き努力していくつもりです！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_022<tab>If it isn't our flyer-distributing hero back from duty! Have you taken a look at all the new additions they've made to our stage?
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_022あら、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんじゃない。
以前より、少し飾り付けが豪華になったんだけど気づいた？
公演を見に来てくれる人を増やして、もっと豪華にしたいわね。

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_030<tab>Do you see all those people clamoring for my attention in the audience? My magical performance has attracted more onlookers than I can count!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_ULALA_000_030あ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
見てよ、この人だかり！　こんなに多くの人を魅了してるなんて、
ウララって本当に罪な子だわ～っ♪

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, have you seen the decorations that have been strung up around our stage? They're nearly as pretty as our new costumes!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_NARUMI_000_031)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
見てください、この豪華な舞台の飾り付けを……！
応援してくれるみなさんに、感謝の気持ちで一杯です！

source: TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_032<tab>There's been such a massive turnout and I couldn't be happier. I just wish that they would stop chanting my name! It makes me so nervous I sometimes forget how to breathe!
target:
TEXT_FESPDY2016SHARE_00319_MASHAMHAKARACCA_000_032あら、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
見に来てくれるお客さんが増えたのは、嬉しいんだけれど……
お陰で、緊張して以前より歌を間違えちゃうのよ！
